item.title: Rusting
item.description: The Rust implementation is finished! Surprise! Usually it takes several blog posts to finish an implementation, but Rust was quite straightforward. It definitely helped that I was already conversant in Rust, and I had a decent template from the Haskell implementation. Workflow The implementation plan I’ve settled on looks something like this: Hello World - Get the language installed. Choose your frameworks - Specifically the REST API framework and the postgres library.
